answers.answer: Hi,I understand your concern regarding this.  What other symptoms are present? Impaired wound healing may warrant further evaluation also by your doctor.  Additional diagnostic tests may need to be done to rule out other underlying conditions also like diabetes. Alternative therapies such as acupuncture may also help. Take care and do keep us posted.

question: I had chemotherapy for breast cancer 3 years ago.  Since that time I have had a hard time with healing.  If I get a scratch or cut on my body it does not heal.  Are there any natural or homeopathic skin treatments available?
title: Wound healing after cancer treatment
